resources.string: Array Index Out \n Of Bounds Exception
Caused by an issue with your math, such as diving by zero. \n This is commonly caused if you make a mistake with integer math. \n for example:

Someone not super familiar with integer math would probably see this
 and think "Oh, i gets set to 0.5 and then k divides 10 by i, which
 should be 20".Integer math however says "integer 1 / integer 2 = 0,
 so i = 0, then k is set to 10 / i, which is zero"
 which would cause you to divide by zero.
